nodes.text: Ghost was a male Neimoidian Information broker operating on Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War. Upon learning that Imperial Intelligence reports from officer Keeling were intercepted by a gang called the Krayts and was about to the highesy bidder, he contacted an Imperial individual and provided him with the time and place at which the sales were about to take place. After the reports were recovered, officer Keeling transferred to Ghost his broker's fee.
Ghost appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic as an NPC on Nar Shaddaa, who begins the quest "Let the Vendor Beware".
